name: all my hopes and dreams
description: Analog-digital hybrid glitch painting. First layer drawn on a 1991 'My First Sony' analog videopainter and recorded to VHS. Second signal mixed in from a hardware-corrupted 16-bit digital painting made on an authentic copy of Mario Paint (1992) running on a modified, circuitbent SNES console. Shot from an 8" SONY Trinitron PVM CRT. 3024x4032
